meaningMnemonic: Something that is <kanji>dangerous</kanji> and <kanji>risky</kanji> is probably pretty <vocabulary>risky</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>dangerous</vocabulary>, and <vocabulary>unsafe</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
